attributes.action: To allow Yorkshire to become independent from the current British Government and allow Yorkshire to have its very own elected Government based centrally to us in Yorkshire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
How can a failing Government meet the needs of a county it knows nothing about when London fails to deliver time and time again for the people of Yorkshire? 
We once voted to have our own centrally elected Government yet London refused to acknowledge our voice!
